DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate the efficacy of BAI Plus 3DCRT in local advanced NSCLC.
DOC.brief_title: Study to Investigate Bronchial Arterrial Infusing (BAI) Plus Three-dimensional Conformal Radiotherapy (3DCRT) in Local Advanced Non-small Cell Lung Cancer (NSCLC)
DOC.criteria: stage IIIA&IIIB NSCLC male or female, Age ≥18Years, ≤70Years Life expectation of at least 12weeks. PS performance 02 Measurable disease according to the Response Evaluation Criteria in Solid Tumours ( RECIST) Patient with prior chemotherapy or radiology for IIIA or IIIB NSCLC
